item.title: 早上好，亚洲。当你们还在睡梦中时，我们阅读量最高的新闻是美国上个月的通胀率意外上升至 3.2

item.title: 前总统欠款 4.5 亿美元。他可能不得不出售资产来充实现金。特朗普位于华尔街的新哥特式建筑是否必须出售？
item.description:
The former president owes $450mn. He might have to sell assets to shore up the cash. Will Trump’s neo-gothic building on Wall Street have to be sold? https://t.co/yYquwMnXLw pic.twitter.com/s9ppanxT2h

— Financial Times (@FT) March 12, 2024

item.title: 德国武装部队的数字和通信系统状况十分糟糕。据一份报告称，一些设施没有 WiFi，只需邮寄纸质医疗记录，军事文件通过传真而不是安全的电子邮件发送。
item.description:
The German armed forces’ digital and communications systems are in a woeful state. Some facilities have no WiFi, paper-only medical records need to be mailed and military documents are sent by fax, rather than secure emaill, according to a report https://t.co/As0sfYA06W pic.twitter.com/7hsnuhe8Id

— Financial Times (@FT) March 12, 2024
